lisaManagerReferenceNumber.description: The reference given to the LISA provider when they applied for approval from HMRC.

payments.description: Pending and paid payments from HMRC and due and collected debts owed to HMRC.

transactionType.description: The type of transaction. This can be money owed to HMRC (Debt), or money paid out by HMRC (Payment).

status.description: The status of the transaction being requested.

paymentAmount.description: Amount pending or paid to the LISA provider, or the amount due or collected from the LISA provider.

paymentReference.description: Payment reference number. This will only be returned for paid payments and collected debts.

paymentDate.description: The date the payment was paid or the debt was collected. This will only be returned for paid payments and collected debts.

dueDate.description: The date the payment or debt is due to be paid or collected. This will only be returned for pending payments and due debts.
